snippet.title: Terminator: Dark Fate - Defiance: We are Legion | Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
We Are Legion is the first DLC for Terminator: Dark Fate - Defiance, a gritty real-time strategy game set in the intense world of Terminator: Dark Fate.
This expansion plunges players back into the heart of the conflict, putting them in command of Legion, the relentless machine army bent on dominating a shattered world.
Step into the boots of Legion and experience the chilling thrill of leading a mechanical force on a mission of total annihilation.

🎮 Play now on Steam ➡️ http://steam.gs/l/2g4pe
💬 Join the Discord Server ➡️ https://discord.gg/u3YY7tnU8D
🦎 More info on Slitherine ➡️ https://bit.ly/3SEjcDJ
